response.overview: A week before Christmas, Kyon wakes up in a world where the SOS Brigade doesn't exist. Mikuru and Yuki don't recognize him, and Haruhi and Itsuki seem to have vanished.
response.title: The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya

results.name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Shoushitsu Trailer Full HD 1080p
